name: Job Up!
description:
JobUp! is about the never-ending cycle of getting a (better) job. What happens to your inner "mojo" during this process ?
How does money affect your actions ?
Do you play along with the social norms ?
Created during the Global Game Jam (Malta) 2016
Creators:
  • James Cauchi (design, dialogues)
  • Mario Debono (Unity, sounds, programming)
  • Tudor Vaida (Unity, programming).
